name: 3D Dogs
description:
3D Dogs

A Game By IhaveFivehat

Controls:
- Arrow Keys: Walk
- R: Restart

NOTICE:
It has come to our attention that, due to the large potential amount of dogs in this game, certain issues may arise during play such as:
- A: Physics issues
- B: Graphics/Performance issues
- C: Player emotional issues
- D: Loud noise issues

Due to these and other complaints, we have provided a HOLD SPACEBAR function which will drain excess dogs from your screen and create a more relaxing and enjoyable atmosphere. Thank you for your patience and continued patronage as we work hard to improve your user experience.
